wikipedia_page.main: Mark Keyworth (19 February 1948 – 23 November 2014) was an English rugby union player who played for Swansea, Aberystwyth, the North Midlands county team, and the national team.Mark was educated at Ellesmere College, Shropshire for whom he played rugby.  Mark also played rugby for Cirencester Agricultural College whilst completing his farming education there.
